subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Andrei Kirilenko had 14 points, 8 rebounds and 7 assists, and the Utah Jazz finally ended Portland’s near-perfect December on Monday night, defeating the visiting Trail Blazers, 111-101, to end their 13-game winning streak.
snippet: Andrei Kirilenko had 14 points, 8 rebounds and 7 assists, and the Utah Jazz finally ended Portland’s near-perfect December on Monday night, defeating the visiting Trail Blazers, 111-101, to end their 13-game winning streak.
